core: Professional Data Engineer – Google Cloud Certification
all: Professional Data Engineer – Google Cloud Certification

jd: From: gaurav kumar, Largeton INC gaurav.kumar@largeton.us Reply to: gaurav.kumar@largeton.us Title: Data Engineer – GCP certified candidate with URL only.Location: NYC (Hybrid – 3 times a week)- Visa: USC or GC Duration: 9-12 months Here are some of the take aways. If they are both currently certified on GCP and ML , they will move through the process quicker. This is a heavy machine learning project. They need to be able to clearly explain how they build data pipelines in Big Querry. They need to have solid experience with Code Integration Tools. Strong airflow experience. Must have trained the data models using ML. Specifically using Vertex and vertex workbench. Explain how they use Vertex to train feedback loops and work with the data scientists. This project is all about automation through ML. This does not mean that they will not be considered if they do not have the ML certification, but they will need to get it. MUST HAVE1 Python2 Spark3 SQL4 Professional Data Engineer – Google Cloud Certification5 Experience in AI Tools or code written to develop AI applications.6 Experience handling large Data Sets Thanks and Regards,Gaurav KumarTechnical RecruiterLargeton.incPh no: +1 (571)-463-9097 Ext. 345Email: gaurav.kumar@largeton.us
